sentence.text: Here we demonstrate association of variants in the mitochondrial asparaginyl-tRNA synthetase asparaginyl-tRNA aminoacylation with human hearing loss and Leigh syndrome.
p.Asn381Ser also disrupts dimerization of asparaginyl-tRNA aminoacylation, while the hearing loss p.Val213Phe variant has no effect on NARS2 oligomerization.
Our findings establish lesions in asparaginyl-tRNA aminoacylation as a new cause for nonsyndromic hearing loss and Leigh syndrome.
